[basic explain]
被攻击时， 所受伤害 -7%%

[detail explain]
被攻击时， 所受伤害 -7%% (在决斗场、 竞技大赛和街头争霸中， 所受伤害 -3%%)

[if]
    [module]
        `[dungeon type]`
        `[war room]`
    [/module]
    [hit]
        1
[/if]

[then]
    [target]
        `myself`    -1
    [add absolute defense percent]
        `all`    7
[/then]

[if]
    [module]
        `[pvp]`
        `[assault]`
    [/module]
    [hit]
        1
[/if]

[then]
    [target]
        `myself`    -1
    [add absolute defense percent]
        `all`    3
[/then]
